application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate, with the submission of details, that appropriate cycle storage, car and motorcycle parking, hard surfacing materials, boundary details, finished ground levels, tree planting, landscaping, and brick detailing would be implemented in accordance with Policy G7 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies DMHB 11, DMHB 14 and DMT6 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (2020).
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 4 (Materials and Appearance) and 6 (Landscaping, Tree Planting, Cycle Storage, and Car Parking) of planning permission ref. 27256/APP/2017/3721, dated 13.04.2021 for 'Alterations and conversion of the Manor Lodge into 2 No. 4-bedroom houses; conversion of the Stable Building into 6 No. 1-bedroom and 2 No. 2-bedroom cottages; conversion of the Office Barn into 1 No. studio flat, 1 No. 1- bedroom flat, 2 No. 2-bedroom houses and 1 No. 3-bedroom house; retention of the Granary Building and conversion to garden store; upgrade of boundary treatments; reinstatement of yard pond, together with associated parking and landscaping.'
